function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of questionnaire for data collection during a pandemic","Impact":"Incomplete or biased data leading to inaccurate analysis and conclusions","Mitigation":"Use of multiple data collection methods and validation measures to ensure data accuracy and completeness","Technologies":"Data validation tools, machine learning algorithms for data cleaning","People":"Researchers, survey respondents","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Spatial analysis and GIS methods for studying green spaces during a pandemic","Impact":"Misinterpretation or misrepresentation of spatial data leading to erroneous conclusions","Mitigation":"Peer review of spatial analysis methods, validation of spatial data with ground truth measurements","Technologies":"QGIS, GIS software, spatial analysis algorithms, ground truth measurement tools","People":"Researchers, spatial data analysts","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Reliance on GIS and big data technologies for COVID-19 response","Impact":"Misuse or misinterpretation of data leading to ineffective or harmful interventions","Mitigation":"Cross-validation of data from multiple sources, involvement of public health experts in data interpretation","Technologies":"Big data analytics, GIS software, data validation tools","People":"Public health experts, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"}]}
